definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to cast (pour metal into a mold)
to cast in metal/(fig.) to forge/to fashion

sentences.english: Cast the aluminium alloy outer cover , gushes out and moulds on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 鑄鋁合金外殼壓制成型，表面噴塑。

sentences.english: The methods of improving cast-rolling strip are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 提出了改善鑄軋帶坯質量的措施。

sentences.english: No man loves his fetters be they made of gold.
sentences.chinese: 即使腳鐐黃金鑄，無人愛上這刑具。
鑄鋁合金外客，表面噴塑。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, heat remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil in the heart cocotte over medium heat.
sentences.chinese: 同時，用中火和桃心鑄鐵鍋加熱另外一湯勺橄欖油。

sentences.english: And he cast four rings for the four ends of the grate of brass， to be places for the staves.
sentences.chinese: 爲銅網的四角鑄四個環子，作爲穿槓的用處。

sentences.english: They cast bronze rings to hold the poles for the four corners of the bronze grating.
sentences.chinese: 爲銅網的四角鑄四個環子，作爲穿槓的用處。

sentences.english: The last copper copekcs of Tsarist Russia were minted in 1916.
sentences.chinese: 沙皇俄國的最後一批銅製戈比鑄於1916年。

sentences.english: Prof. Wen has also made a significant contribution to promote the development of the discipline of tribology.
sentences.chinese: 溫詩鑄教授爲推動本學科的發展作出了重大貢獻。

sentences.english: The great love warms the weak heart of patients.
sentences.chinese: 大愛春風暖人心，妙手仁心鑄英魂。

sentences.english: The woman explained that the IDF caused the damage in Operation Cast Lead.
sentences.chinese: 這位女士說道IDF戰鬥機在鑄鉛運動中導致的破壞。

sentences.english: Preforms with waveguide structure have been formed by using a built -in casting method.
sentences.chinese: 用內鑄法制得了具有波導結構的預製棒。

sentences.english: Thinner shells are also easier to cast and are likely to have fewer defects.
sentences.chinese: 薄殼也很容易鑄亦很可能有更少的缺陷。

sentences.english: In golden world, at snagging cast crisscross rooms.
sentences.chinese: 在金色的世界裏，在戳鑄交錯間。

sentences.english: This is a layered stew cooked over an open fire in a three legged cast - iron18 pot .
sentences.chinese: 它是用架在盆火上的三足鑄鐵鍋分層燉制的一道菜。

definition: to cast (pour metal into a mold)
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
